channel.title: Unable to open folders
channel.description:
I'm not able to open folders on my desktop, when i try to do the screen will just turn blue with no icons or a toolbar, does anyone know how i can fix this?? :(
STILL NEED HELP...I ran a virus check and nothing came up :\

item.title: Unable to open folders
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

Lol I used Kaspersky the first time, I just ran another check using AVG and I got 19 infected files, I cleaned it up and I still can’t open it, my friend said I have BOSD(Blue screen of death) but he said that cleaning it up with AVG would fix it, and it didn’t. :\

Read full topic

item.title: Unable to open folders
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:2, topic:106159”]Press ctrl+alt+del, click File-> New Task (Run…), then enter “explorer.exe” and press OK.
Then stop being pathetic and l2computer.[/quote]

In this case, you would have to end explorer.exe before you start the process again.

Itachi Uchiha:

STILL NEED HELP…I ran a virus check and nothing came up :\

Do more than one virus check, and use another antivirus software. Try Kaspersky, it might pick up what the other antivirus software didn’t. Also, download Spybot S&D and do a spyware scan.

Read full topic

hmm all that does is restart explorer, which would not help fix your problem at all, lemme ask my friend, he’s 1337 with comptuers lol…

Sorry, i think he passed out… if he wakes up il ask him…

item.title: Unable to open folders
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Press ctrl+alt+del, click File-> New Task (Run…), then enter “explorer.exe” and press OK.
Then stop being pathetic and l2computer.
